law.catch_line: A holder of a wholesaler's license may not sell a tip jar packet to a person who does not have a tip...

text.section: A holder of a wholesaler's license may not sell a tip jar packet to a person who does not have a tip jar license.

Before selling a tip jar packet, a holder of a wholesaler's license shall:
obtain a gaming sticker from the agency; and
affix the gaming sticker to the tip jar packet in the manner the county commissioners require.
